SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.initMusic.service

Interface SongSearchService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SongSearchDeezerImpl
public interface SongSearchService
Defines methods related to searching for songs using an API

NOTE: Since the method in this class uses an API to perform a search, it can't be tested, so there are no tests for it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<Song>
    externalSearchForSongs(String songName, String artistName)
    Searches for songs related to given query.
    String
    getSongPreview(Long deezerID)
    Gets the link to the preview of the song with the given id.

  • Method Details

    • externalSearchForSongs

      Set<Song> externalSearchForSongs(String songName, String artistName)
      Searches for songs related to given query. In theory, this method should use a API to search for songs from an external service like Deezer, Spotify, or any music API.
      Parameters:
      songName - Name of song to search for
      artistName - Name of artist to search for
      Returns:
      Set of songs related to query

    • getSongPreview

      String getSongPreview(Long deezerID)
      Gets the link to the preview of the song with the given id. Deezer makes some links secure, and makes them expire after a day, so we always have to reload the link to preview the song. We couldn't done a better implementation with more time, but this was a last minute fix.
      Parameters:
      deezerID - ID to get link for
      Returns:
      String of url
